title: Enthalpy change for oxidation of NO

content.question:
Reaction 1: 

<math alttext="N 2 O 4 gas, reacts to produce, 2 N O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mtext>)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 

<math alttext="delta H sub 1, equals positive 57.9 kilojoules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>57.9</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> 

Reaction 2: 

<math alttext="2 N O gas, plus O 2 gas, react to produce, 2 N O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 

<math alttext="delta H sub 2, equals negative 113.1 kilojoules" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>113.1</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ</mtext></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> 

Based on the information for two different reactions given above, which of the following gives the quantities needed to calculate the enthalpy change for the reaction represented by the overall equation below?
<math alttext="2 N O gas, plus O 2 gas, react to produce, N 2 O 4 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="delta H sub 1, plus delta H sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta H sub 1, plus negative delta H sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative delta H sub 1, plus delta H sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta H sub 1, plus open parenthesis, 2 times delta H sub 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative delta H sub 1, plus delta H sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msub><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.A: Identify quantities needed to solve a problem from given information (e.g., text, mathematical expressions, graphs, or tables).
